whereisit.config.title: Where Is It
whereisit.config.client.searchUsingItemI: When no GUI is open, whether to search using the item in your hand when pressing the keybind.
whereisit.config.client.closeGuiOnFoundR: Whether the currently open GUI will close if results were found. Will only happen once per search.
whereisit.config.client.showSlotHighligh: Whether to highlight slots that matched the last search.
How much the mouse's position influences the colour of a slot highlight.
How much a slot's X position influences the colour of a slot highlight.
whereisit.config.client.highlightTimeFac: Modifier for how fast Where Is It will cycle through the current colour scheme's gradient.
whereisit.config.client.randomScheme.des: Whether to use a random pride colour scheme each search.
whereisit.config.common.searchRange.desc: Radius from the player's position to search for items.
whereisit.config.common.fadeoutTime.desc: How long it takes world and slot highlights to fade out.
Applies to both local regular highlights and server-side highlights.
Whether to search within certain items that contain other items, such as Shulker Boxes or Bundles.
whereisit.config.common.enableDefaultSea: Whether to enable the mod's block searchers for ender chests, and the fallback using Fabric's Transfer API.
whereisit.config.common.commandAliases.d: A list of aliases for the search command. Disable by removing all options.
whereisit.config.common.commandAliases.r: Requires a world reload, or a restart on a server.
whereisit.config.compatibility.requiresM: Requires the mod to be installed to function.
whereisit.config.compatibility.client.re: Allows Where Is It to obtain items from the vanilla recipe book's ghost recipes.
whereisit.config.compatibility.client.je: Allows Where Is It to obtain the item from JEI's overlays and recipe screens.
whereisit.config.compatibility.client.re: Allows Where Is It to obtain the item from REI's overlays and recipe screens.
whereisit.config.compatibility.client.em: Allows Where Is It to obtain the item from EMI's overlays and recipe screens.
whereisit.config.debug.common.printSearc: Whether to print search times in chat. Applies to all online players if on a server.
whereisit.config.debug.common.forceServe: Whether to force all requests to use server-side highlighting, instead of just clients without Where Is It. This may disable features of other mods that can ask for search results, but may have better rendering compatibility.
